name: Islander (Soulexx)
description:
You find yourself on an island with a rock and no food, unlock new islands to explore, build shelter to survive. And of course, kill the Moo-Moo's! Created by Soulexx, Maevrry, KGB_lex, LilyHops. 

IF THE GAME IS "LOADING FOREVER" PRESS ESCAPE TWICE(Pause and Unpause game), Music playing means it is almost done loading.

HOW TO PLAY:

You will start off with a rock, your goal is to gather resources and survive, as well as level up in order to unlock new Islands to gather new resources. Level 10 unlocks Stone Island, Level 15 unlocks Petrified Island, and level 20 unlocks Mesmir Island

KEYBOARD AND MOUSE:

Use item: Left click

Sprint: Shift

Crouch: Left Control

Interact: E

Drop item: Q

Jump: Spacebar

Rotate building: R

Scroll through Hotbar: Mouse scrollwheel

Open inventory: Tab

Pause and Resume game: Esc

CONTROLLER:

Use item: Right trigger

Sprint: Left trigger

Crouch: Press right joystick

Interact: Left Button

Drop item: Right Button

Jump: Bottom Button

Rotate Building : D-pad Up

Scroll through Hotbar: Left and Right bumper

Open inventory : Upper Button

Pause and Resume game: Middle left button
